Aptell.Print

Description

Created : 2015-04-10 Maintainer : kongra@gmail.com Stability : experimental

Synopsis

  • type RulePrinter a = a -> ShowS
  • toString :: RulePrinter a -> Bool -> Node a -> String

Documentation

type RulePrinter a = a -> ShowS

toString :: RulePrinter a -> Bool -> Node a -> String

Returns a textual representation of a parse tree represented by its root node.

toStringD :: RulePrinter a -> Int -> Bool -> Node a -> String

Works like toString, but allows to pass a maximal depth.

Produced by Haddock version 2.14.3
